data.actual_result: The animation resets when you tap on reaction, even if you tap on a different one. It also happens when multiple users react on the message in a short amount of time
data.expected_result: The animation of the animated emoji should continue normally
data.short_description: Animation of an animated emoji resets in reactions when reacting with another emoji on the same message
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone with a Nitro subscription add a raction to a message with an animated emoji - Have this person add another reaction with a different emoji (no matter if animated or not) - React as well with those emojis by tapping on them under the message
